results.title: Influence of Statins on Circulating Inflammatory Cytokines in Patients With Abnormal Glucose Homeostasis: A Meta-analysis of Data From Randomized Controlled Trials.
results.text_hl: IMPLICATIONS: The administration of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@abnormal glucose@@@ hemostasis was associated with a reduced serum @GENE_CRP @GENE_1401 @@@CRP@@@ concentration.

citations.NLM: Milajerdi A, Sadeghi A, Mousavi SM, Larijani B, Esmaillzadeh A. Influence of Statins on Circulating Inflammatory Cytokines in Patients With Abnormal Glucose Homeostasis: A Meta-analysis of Data From Randomized Controlled Trials. Clin Ther. 2020 Feb;42(2):e13-e31. PMID: 31955966

results.title: Mevalonate pathway orchestrates insulin signaling via RAB14 geranylgeranylation-mediated phosphorylation of AKT to regulate hepatic glucose metabolism.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_geranylgeraniol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017338 @@@Geranylgeraniol@@@ (GGOH), a precursor of @CHEMICAL_geranylgeranyl_pyrophosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C002963 @@@GGPP@@@, is able to ameliorate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced systemic @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@glucose metabolism disorders@@@ in vivo.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Zhu L, Zheng Z, Meng L, Liu H, Wang K, Chen J, Li P, Yang H. Mevalonate pathway orchestrates insulin signaling via RAB14 geranylgeranylation-mediated phosphorylation of AKT to regulate hepatic glucose metabolism. Metabolism. 2022 Mar;128():155120. PMID: 34995578

results.title: Simvastatin Impairs Glucose Homeostasis in Mice Depending on PGC-1alpha Skeletal Muscle Expression
results.text_hl: ...3.2. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@Impaired Glucose Homeostasis@@@ in WT and OE @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ Whereas KO @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ Showed Already Higher Blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@Glucose@@@ Concentrations during the iGTT Without @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Treatment

results.title: Differences in the diabetogenic effect of statins in patients with prediabetes. The PRELIPID study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: This study suggests that there are differences in the diabetogenic effect of statins. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and high doses of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ may be associated with greater @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@impairment in glucose metabolism@@@ than @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@pitavastatin@@@ and other statins with less @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering potency such as @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Trias F, Pintó X, Corbella E, Suárez-Tembra M, Ruíz-García A, Díaz-Díaz JL, Sánchez-Ruíz-Granado E, Sarasa I, Martínez-Porqueras R, Rodríguez-Sánchez MA, Corbella X, PRELIPID Study Group. Differences in the diabetogenic effect of statins in patients with prediabetes. The PRELIPID study. Med Clin (Barc). 2022 Jun 10;158(11):531-539. PMID: 34517987

results.title: The effect of fenofibrate on lymphocyte release of proinflammatory cytokines and systemic inflammation in simvastatin-treated patients with atherosclerosis and early glucose metabolism disturbances.
results.text_hl: The effect of @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ on lymphocyte release of proinflammatory cytokines and systemic @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and early @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@glucose metabolism disturbances@@@.

results.title: Anti-inflammatory and monocyte-suppressing effects of simvastatin in patients with impaired fasting glucose.
results.text_hl: They also show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is an effective anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ drug in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with isolated early @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@glucose metabolism abnormalities@@@.

results.title: Synergistic effect of simvastatin and ezetimibe on lipid and pro-inflammatory profiles in pre-diabetic subjects
results.text_hl: Expected synergistic lowering effects of a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ combination on LDL-cholesterol, @GENE_APOB @GENE_338 @@@apolipoprotein B@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ levels were confirmed in subjects with early @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@disturbances of glucose metabolism@@@.

citations.NLM: Kater AL, Batista MC, Ferreira SR. Synergistic effect of simvastatin and ezetimibe on lipid and pro-inflammatory profiles in pre-diabetic subjects Diabetol Metab Syndr. 2010 Jun 7;2():34. PMID: 20529243
